a1: The Pomodoro Technique is a time management method that uses a timer to break work into intervals (typically 25 minutes) separated by short breaks.
q2: Can I customize the timer durations?
a2: Yes, you can customize the work duration, short break, long break, and the number of sessions before a long break.
q3: Does it automatically switch between work and break?
a3: Yes, the timer automatically transitions between work sessions and breaks, playing a notification sound at each transition.
